title: MLOps Engineer
summary: Results-driven MLOps Engineer with 4 years of experience specializing in building, deploying, and monitoring scalable machine learning systems. Proficient in Python, AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes, with a strong background in CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation for ML workflows.

description: Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment using GitLab CI and Argo CD, reducing deployment time by 30%.
Managed and scaled Kubernetes clusters on AWS EKS for model inference and training workloads, ensuring high availability.
Developed custom monitoring solutions with Prometheus and Grafana for tracking model performance and infrastructure health.
Collaborated with data scientists to containerize ML models and integrate them into production systems using Docker.
Automated infrastructure provisioning for ML environments using Terraform and CloudFormation.
Built and maintained ETL pipelines using Python and Apache Airflow to process large datasets for ML projects.
Developed data ingestion systems from various sources into data lakes (S3) and data warehouses (Redshift).
Supported data scientists in preparing and cleaning data for model training.
Implemented basic monitoring for data pipelines to ensure data quality and availability.

education.degree: Master of Engineering in Data Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
